articles.description: Payton Pritchard had 19 points and 10 assists, and Troy Brown Jr. also had a double-double to lead Oregon past Washington State 84-57 on Sunday night.
articles.headline: Pritchard, Brown lead Oregon to 84-57 win over Washington St

articles.description: Shep Garner scored 16 points and Tony Carr had 15 points to lead Penn State to a 74-52 victory over Illinois on Sunday night.
articles.headline: Garner, Carr help Penn State beat Illinois 74-52

articles.description: After scoring a team-high 23 points, Grayson Allen credits the good ball movement to set him up in the Blue Devils' 80-69 win over the Yellow Jackets.
articles.headline: Allen credits ball movement for open looks

images.caption: After scoring a team-high 23 points, Grayson Allen credits the good ball movement to set him up in the Blue Devils' 80-69 win over the Yellow Jackets.
images.name: Allen credits ball movement for open looks

articles.description: Grayson Allen scored 23 points and No. 9 Duke beat Georgia Tech 80-69 on Sunday night to end a two-game losing streak.
articles.headline: No. 9 Duke beats Georgia Tech to end 2-game losing streak

images.caption: After scoring a team-high 23 points, Grayson Allen credits the good ball movement to set him up in the Blue Devils' 80-69 win over the Yellow Jackets.
images.name: Allen credits ball movement for open looks

articles.description: Without Marvin Bagley III, Grayson Allen and a slew of freshman defeat a struggling Georgia Tech team 80-69.
articles.headline: Duke rolls to victory over Georgia Tech

images.caption: Without Marvin Bagley III, Grayson Allen and a slew of freshman defeat a struggling Georgia Tech team 80-69.
images.name: Duke rolls to victory over Georgia Tech

articles.description: Devin Davis scored 16 points, Armoni Brooks had a double-double and Houston throttled Tulane 73-42 on Sunday to stay in a tie for second place in the American Athletic Conference standings with Wichita State.
articles.headline: Houston dissects cold-shooting Tulane 73-42
